<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1924]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] begins his Professorship of English Language at the [[University of Leeds]].
* '''[[1979]]''' - The ''[[Jackanory]]'' episode "An Unexpected Party" is aired on the [[BBC]].
* '''[[2003]]''' - ''[[The Gospel According to Tolkien]]'' is published.
* '''[[2007]] - The second and expanded edition of ''[[Tolkien On Fairy-stories]]'' is published.'''
